channel.title: Comments on: Ask Deemable Tech: Keyboard Shortcuts

item.title: By: Ray Hollister
item.dc:creator: Ray Hollister
item.description:
Hey Kathleen,
All of the Windows shortcuts work on Windows 7 and Windows 10 as well.
- Ray Hollister
item.content:encoded:
Hey Kathleen,

All of the Windows shortcuts work on Windows 7 and Windows 10 as well.

– Ray Hollister

item.title: By: Kathleen Clower

item.description: What about Windows 7? And how will this change for Windows 10?
